document_data.name: Malyk
document_data.mainbody: '''Malyk''' was a lord of [[Daggerdale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
He was allegedly from a far-distant branch of the House of [[Morn]], the historic rulers of [[Daggerdale]].<ref> His loyalty to the Black Network of the [[Zhentarim]] prompted them to instill rebellion, eliminate the House of Morn and install Malyk as the Lord of Daggerdale. The surviving heir to the house was the adventurer [[Randal Morn]] who fled into the hills to raise a resistance force.<ref>

Malyk ruled as a puppet leader for the Zhentarim until the {{YearlinkName|1353}} when he was killed in an attack lead by Randal Morn and his followers.
